name: socrata-report
description: MCP App for querying Socrata open data and generating interactive reports

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=report-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'cross-env INPUT=report-app.html vite build --watch' 'npm run serve'
